tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries get_folders ## UNKNOWN library_id
#if $folder_id: --folder_id "$folder_id" #end if #if $name: --name "$name" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: folder_id
param.label: Folder Id
param.help: filter for folder by folder id

param.name: name
param.label: Name
param.help: filter for folder by name. For ``name`` specify the full path of the folder starting from the library's root folder, e.g. ``/subfolder/subsubfolder``.

tool.help: Get all the folders or filter specific one(s) via the provided ``name`` or ``folder_id`` in data library with id ``library_id``. Provide only one argument: ``name`` or ``folder_id``, but not both.
